评论详情: These sweatshirts are comfortable and pretty high quality. I have bought 4 different colors because I like them so much. They wash well and don’t appear to shrink. I will probably buy more in the future.

评论用户: I loved this backpack and am a college student with two computers and a ton of pencils. It holds a lot and the material is nice. Trendy for any age group too.
评论详情: I am 5”7, 135 pounds, 36C,  and got a medium and it looks like an XL. Would have exchanged it for a smaller size but I was cold so I kept it!
Seems like great quality and very soft. Would love for the sleeves to be a little longer. They do ride up on the arm. If that does not bother you then it’s a nice sweatshirt for the money.

The perfect grey sweatshirt. Great quality - hefty but not too heavy, beautiful fabric. It's oversized but not at all schlumpy, and it's not super-long but provides just the right amount of coverage over leggings. Lots of compliments for such a basic item - looks much more expensive! Machine wash and dry - holds up beautifully. I don't know about the other colors, but they grey is perfect!
So soft and warm, but is lightweight! Washes well!
Sweatshirt had bad chemical smell when I got it. I’ve washed it 4 times now. Still has smell.

I have been looking for an oversized sweatshirt in a maroon/ burgundy color, finally found this one. It’s more of a red. The fit and style is great, feels soft and cozy. Not too heavy. Definitely buying more colors.
I own this in multiple colors! Love it. I have watched it many times and still looks just as good as when I got it. Great quality!
These sweatshirts are perfect. I love them . I have almost every color .

First of all, the color was much lighter than the picture, more of a cream color. The first (and only) time I wore this shirt, there was so much fuzz from the inside that it got all over everything it came in contact with, including in my hair when I took it off. This will probably go in the garbage, unfortunately. I don't even want to put it in the washing machine because I'm afraid of the mess it will make.

I bought this for my daughter because she wanted an oversized sweatshirt. The quality of this sweatshirt is great. It is thick and warm. The dark pink is a beautiful color. It has been washed several times and so far is holding up well.

This sweater is very cozy and flattering but be sure to buy one size up. I’m 5’5”, 160 lbs and XL is the perfect size. I wear my bluegrey sweater lounging around the house and about to order another in coffeegrey. 🩶🩵

I ordered the light gray “Los Angeles” sweater and I love it very much. It’s very comfortable, keeps you warm, and is true to size. Doesn’t have that itchy sweater feeling which is a plus. Worth the buy.
Very thick and warm.  Nice quality.
I love the fit of these sweatshirts and have ordered several. Unfortunately, they stain/spot super easy. After one wear, mine have all become 'yardwork' shirts. Meh.

评论详情: The color and size was great, but it had obviously been worn.  It had oil stains on the front, back and sleeves.  There were other marks like from food ?  It smelled like some sort of cologne on the neckline.  So disappointed.

评论概述: Love this sweatshirt but the color isn’t what I expected

This sweatshirt is big and comfy in all the right ways.
I absolutely love this! It’s incredibly comfortable and oversized

评论概述: Was sent a used / returned sweater
评论详情: Received this sweater with huge oil stain, no tags, and pet hair on it. Seems to be i was sent a used and returned item.

评论概述: Huge, if you are a short person, buy 2 sizes down, it will still be oversized!
评论详情: The Bad: It does shed a lot on the inside, but after a couple of washings that stops. It is hughe! I wear a medium and like casual clothes to be loose. Due to the reviews I ordered a small. It is still VERY large. Maybe my stature of 5'3" adds to the oversize feel. But I am certain I could have ordered an xtra small and still had plenty of room. Since this is just to walk the dog on cool mornings, or to lounge around in the house, and maybe a quick run to the grocery or the coffee shop, I did not bother to return it for an xtra-small.  The Good: It's a pretty color (I bought the mauve-rose). It is warm and cozy and fufills the purpose that I bought it for.  If you are shorter than 5'4", you should consider going 2 sizes smaller than normal. It will still be oversized.
I have this sweatshirt in multiple colors. The quality is outstanding and holds up nicely after being washed. It’s very soft and extremely warm!

As the temperature drops and the leaves turn golden, there's nothing quite like the feeling of slipping into a cozy oversized sweater. If you’re on the hunt for the perfect blend of style, warmth, and comfort, look no further! This is a very nice oversized sweater that checks all the boxes for a must-have addition to your wardrobe.
Inside is really soft and feels like good quality. Based on the size guide is said to get a medium, but I got a small and it still fits oversized.
These are a nice quality and colors are nice and really vibrant. They wash great also. I got the dark grey and navy.

I would like this sweatshirt, however, it has a Smell that I have not been able to resolve! It's like a metal smell or something. I wish I could get my money back, but when things are shipped from China I wonder if it's worth the hassle.

You don’t know me from Adam, but I know a lot about black sweatshirts so just try and trust me.  It’s a really good one.  Steve Jobs had a black turtleneck, and I have many, many of this same, black, oversized sweatshirt.
Very comfortable. Love the fit. My favorite sweater

Love this sweatshirt! Bought one on sale and loved it so much bought another one. Fits oversized and is great with leggings. Very thick and warm. Will be buying more because I will be living in these this winter!
I bought this on a whim because the price was good. The comfort exceeded my expectations. Size up to allow for some shrinkage with the first wash.
Soft and great quality fabric.
This sweatshirt is fantastic! It’s has the large feel while the fabric is so soft! I will be buying more in a variety of colors!
Fabric feels great and original fit was wonderful. Washed it once and it shrank.
Love the sweatshirt, not too heavy, slightly oversized, washes up nice, soft and comfy, no fading after several washes.

Love this sweatshirt!

Very oversized. Went with Amazon's sizing suggestion and it's huge. Will not order from seller again

评论概述: The perfect sweatshirt fit, paired with awful product management.
评论详情: I’m not kidding, this is the most PERFECT cut sweatshirt. I’ve purchased three. That said, I’m cutting my losses and moving on. The first sweatshirt I got, I LOVED but the colors were orange and white as opposed to brown and white as advertised. No problem, I’ll just return it and got TWO more. Unfortunately what other reviews have mentioned the light blue one had a what appears to oil stains all down the front, and the dark green one, with good splatters ALL over it, and smelling like it was worn to work in a restaurant. Both items bagged and labeled for shipping so someone obviously decided that it was in appropriate condition for a $40 sweatshirt. So, strike 2 & 3.  If anyone knows where to get this sweatshirt outside of this particular store, I’m all ears.
It is a nice thick pull over but mine came with a weird almost waxy feeling on the outside. No matter how much or how I wash it, it always has that feeling. The inside is noce and soft though.
This sweatshirt shed like crazy even after multiple washes. Has ruined my bras and leggings

评论概述: Good quality but extremely short sleeves
评论详情: The quality of this item is decent. It's pretty thick and the inside is soft. It does shed considerably, but I've found that just washing it in cold water helps. The real issue that I have is that the sleeves are incredibly short. I'm tall and have long arms, so I'm used to sleeves being a bit short on me, but the sleeves on this are some of the shortest I have ever seen. About ten inches of my arms are exposed in this, so it's not even a good option for cold weather for me. I've already sized up with this in mind but to no avail. I'd only recommend this sweater for people with short arms.
My go to sweater! Oversized. Soft & I’ve been asked a dozen times where I got it! Buying in more colors asap!

I ordered two of these in different colors and I'll probably get some more! They're substantial, but soft. They are finished enough to wear to work, but also good for lounging on the weekend. They are oversized, but that's what I wanted. Very happy with these.
Oversized, comes below my butt so perfect to wear with leggings! Very thick, soft and warm!
Very comfty and great material!
Super soft, comfortable, nice sweatshirt
This is for a Christmas gift. It looks fine to me. That's all I can say

Great oversized sweatshirt!  Just what I was looking for...
